title: Chem Trails and Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/2/18
itunes:title: Chem Trails and Weather Manipulation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/2/18
description:
George Noory and environmental activist Matthew Landman discuss his research into chem trails and weather manipulation, and whether chemicals and genetically modified foods are schemes to endanger the human race.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
